entry.title: Hello Internet!
entry.content: We live in a fantastic world, a world where information is distributed way faster than it can be assimilated: in a snap of fingers new ideas are delivered to the whole planet, howerver, it takes days, months or even years that those same ideas to be learned and well understood.
entry.summary: We live in a fantastic world, a world where information is distributed way faster than it can be assimilated: in a snap of fingers new ideas are delivered to the whole planet, howerver, it takes days, months or even years that those same ideas to be learned and well understood.
